Author: gimmethatdamnavocado
Text: Every single day. I’m pretty small in frame so despite never being “big”, my bones were never protruding. But I’ve lost weight and now I can see my hand bones, wrist bones, chest and basically most of my bones and I’m very mesmerised by them. Sadly it also means my I can’t wear the rings I have as they’ll fall off too..

Author: bir_die
Text: Frequently. I used to have an entire folder of just “bone checks”. Early morning light + rib cages and spines = gorgeous.   Tbh I miss my bones so much. Even though at the same time, I knew I looked disgusting to other people. But ugh, they were just so delicate and lovely.
